Mulaza Kaira (amụrụ na 10 Ọktoba n'afọ 1984), nke a makwaara site na aha Macky II, Macky 2, MK Macky 2, DJ Bugar, na Flava Boy, bụ onye Zambia na-emeri ọtụtụ onyinye hip hop, onye na-agụ egwu, onye na'ede egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri. A maara ya maka isonye na oge nke itoolu nke Big Brother Africa, ebe ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke atọ na asọmpi ahụ. Kaira si Chingola, Zambia ma na-elekọta Macky 2 Hope Foundation, nke na-akwado ụmụ mgbei na ụmụaka na-adịghị ike.
Kaira malitere igosi mmasị na egwu n'oge ọ bụ nwata mgbe ọ gachara ụka Katọlik na Ndola.

N'afọ 2011, ọ hapụrụ ụlọ gaa Lusaka, ebe ọ wepụtara abọm ya Ndimupondo n'okpuru akara Digital X na Alpha Entertainment na J-Kayo Egwu abụọ sitere na abọm ahụ, "I am The President" na "Number 1 Fan", natara egwu redio ma ndị na-ege ntị nabatara ya nke ọma. Kaira natara Zambia Music Award maka Album nke Afọ na 2013 maka abọm ya Legendary N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya na Zambia Music Awards, na ngalaba nke Best Mainstream Artist, Best Hip Hop / Rap Album na Best Collaboration.

Kaira bụ onye na-asọ mpi na oge nke itoolu nke Big Brother Africa, ụfọdụ ndị na-ekiri ya kwuru na ọ "dị jụụ". Ọ lanarịrị n'ụlọ ahụ n'ogologo ihe ngosi ahụ ma nweta nkwado dị ukwuu site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya na ndị Zambia n'ozuzu
Ọ nọrọ n'ụlọ ahụ ruo izu nke itoolu na nke ikpeazụ, mgbe e wepụrụ ya n'ọnọdụ nke atọ.
Mulaza Kaira lụrụ Cheelo Hantiinga onye ha nwere nwa nwanyị na nwa nwoke.
